title: Hill Giant (Desert Plateau)

properties.value: Hill Giants of the Desert Plateau are a variation of the standard hill giant, where a small tribe of them can be found south-west of the Citharede Abbey. One lone hill giant wielding a hammer can be found directly south of the anvil on the plateau, who cannot be attacked with melee as he is out of reach.

content:
This article is about the variant found on the Desert Plateau. For the standard variant of hill giants, see Hill Giant. For the variant found in Kourend, see Hill Giant (Dark).
 This article has a money making guide: Killing hill giants.
Please add tips to the subpage, rather than the article below.
This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Hill Giants of the Desert Plateau are a variation of the standard hill giant, where a small tribe of them can be found south-west of the Citharede Abbey. One lone hill giant wielding a hammer can be found directly south of the anvil on the plateau, who cannot be attacked with melee as he is out of reach.

They share the same drop table as their standard counterparts, but drop steel scimitars instead of steel longswords, and drop iron med helms instead of iron full helms.

  • The tribe of hill giants on the Desert Plateau.

  • A lone hill giant, blocked off by rocks.
